metadata.title: CVE-2024-39489 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ipv6: sr: fix memleak in seg6_hmac_init_algo  seg6_hmac_init_algo returns without cleaning up the previous allocations if one fails, so it's going to leak all that memory and the crypto tfms.  Update seg6_hmac_exit to only free the memory when allocated, so we can reuse the code directly.
